definition: in a state of sexual virginity
details:
adjective
- in a state of sexual virginity
= example: in a state of sexual virginity
= synonyms: virgin, virginal
- (of color) being chromatically pure
= synonyms: saturated
- concerned with theory and data rather than practice
- free from discordant qualities
- (used of persons or behaviors) having no faults
- free of extraneous elements of any kind
= example: free of extraneous elements of any kind
- without qualification
= synonyms: stark
